file_content.text: I am a loyal pawn of our Imperial overlords...
There. I've used a medpac on you. You should be fine.
And you've got your choice of analgesics to steal if there's any lingering aches.
Next time, could I maybe pose as a pharmaceutical rep?
Don't ever try that again.
If you've got to break in here a second time, then we're all in trouble.
Any idea where I can find Darmas Pollaran?
Where to now?
Last I heard, he was being wheeled in to surgery.
You'll understand if I'm not brimming with gratitude.
Thanks for the "help."
Wouldn't hurt you to pretend.
Nevis Kitt said you're looking for that double agent, Darmas something. Last I heard, he was in the surgical wing.
Now I'd better get back out there before anybody misses me.
Doctor Shi Bata?
Ah, yes. The new patient. I was told to expect a captain with a serious leg injury....
Nevis Kitt said you need to get inside. The only way in is on a stretcher....
...with the rest of the casualties.
Ow! You scum-sucking son of a Hutt!
That hurt!
Quit whining, it's just a leg.
You didn't get your reputation without getting hurt worse than that.
You traitor!
I'm going to kill you!
Do you want to draw the entire army down on us? This is the only way in.
You could have hit something important! Aim for the foot!
Be careful!
Or the brain....
It's got to be enough that the Imperial commanders won't tell you to wrap it and keep fighting.
Now get on the stretcher. We can fix the leg inside....
All hail our Imperial overlords.
